question: Ayushman CAPF scheme is a joint initiative of National Health Authority (NHA) and which Ministry?
option4: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
explanation:
Union Home Minster Amit Shah launched Ayushman CAPF scheme, which will benefit around 10 lakh personnel of Central Armed Police Forces (CAPFs) and their family members.
The scheme is a joint initiative of National Health Authority (NHA) with the Ministry of Home Affairs. Cashless and paperless medical treatment will be given to the beneficiaries at 24,000 hospitals in the country.
